The Shop

Charron Guitars was born out of lifelong passion for guitars and music and years of practice at the workbench.

We offer proud to offer full service guitar repair, modification and restoration. From restringing or setuping up an old guitar to replacing cracked bodies and broken necks, we strive to repair any stringed instrument that your bring in.

Our Services

Types of Instruments

  • Electric and acoustic guitars
  • Bass Guitars
  • Violins
  • Mandolins
  • Banjos
  • Ukeleles

Maintenance & Modifications

  • Meticulous and professional setups
  • Precision fret leveling, dressing, and replacement
  • Electronics (pickups, wiring, shielding, peizos)
  • Neck reseting
  • Nuts, saddles, and zero-frets
  • Restringing

Restoration

  • Electronics Repairs
  • Cracks and body damage
  • Broken Necks
  • Bridge repair and replacement
  • Polishing and paint jobs

Custom Builds and Designs

  • Design your own guitar body
  • Replicate and existing style
  • Choose your own tonewood
  • Custom wiring and electronics
  • Buzz Feeton intonation system
  • Custom paintjobs and visual design

Donation & Charity

Music is gift. In an effort to reach out to the community we have introduced a program repairing & restoring cheap guitars and donating them to people who wouldn’t otherwise be able to afford them. A musical instrument can make a important difference in someone’s life so contact us to see how you can help too.

“
Timothy Charron

We’re currently accepting donations of older guitars that may need a bit of work, a bit of repair, or can be used for pieces/parts.

We’ll fix them up and forward them on to folks who would not otherwise be able to get their hands on a proper guitar.

So if you have one to give, or know someone who could use a hand getting one, please send us a note. Thanks!

The Owner

touch with Tim

Curious about something? We appreciate all types of questions. Whether you are looking for a repair or want to spec out something completely new, we look forward to getting in touch with you. Allow at least 24 hours and use the form below or contact me by phone 514-638-1845
